ygData.subject: Re: Changing Resolution
ygData.msgSnippet: i have a different kind of resolution problem...when i increase resolution, it just makes the everquest window smaller on my monitor (with the ensuing negative
ygData.messageBody:
i have a different kind of resolution problem...when i increase resolution,
it just makes the everquest window smaller on my monitor (with the ensuing
negative border space increasing). anybody have an aswer for this one ?

4400 velocity STB 16meg Riva TnT
Viewsonic 17PS monitor

thanks Gwin


-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Wang <twang@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 31, 1999 11:22 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Changing Resolution


>From: "Tom Wang" <twang@...>
>
>simple, you're using old drivers. Goto www.3dfx.com and download the newest
>Voodoo 2 reference drivers. It will fix all your problems.
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Su-chan <chuguet@...>
>To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
>Sent: Monday, May 31, 1999 2:54 AM
>Subject: [EverQuest] Changing Resolution
>
>
>> From: "Su-chan" <chuguet@...>
>>
>> Hello.-
>>
>> I've just got the game and played this weekend but I have a problem with
>the
>> resolution.
>>
>> I have a 3DBlaster Voodoo2 and the game recognizes it and works fine at
>> 640x480.
>> But when I go and click on the resolution option to change it the game
>hangs
>> up totally. I tried again and I waited, maybe the game was loading
>something
>> but nothing, all movement in the screen stops and the game hangs.
>>
>> How can I change the resolution? I would like to achieve 800x600.
>>
>> Thanks a lot.
>>
>> Daryoon
>> Lvl 2 Bard
>> Erollisi Marr
>>
